taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotama evaṃ kalyāṇa kittisadda
sassamaṇabrāhmaṇa pajā sadevamanussa sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti so

dukkhanti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti pe ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāmī paṭipadāti yathābhūtaṃ

uddesa uddiṭṭha vitthārena atthaṃ avibhatta vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajituṃ
nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati na vimuccati etaṃ santanti passato
orambhāgiya saṃyojana parikkhaya opapātika tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhamma tasmā
vimuccati etaṃ santanti passato tassa mayhaṃ ānanda etadahosi
dukkhanirodhoti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāmī paṭipadāti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti
devānaminda evamidhekacca sattā kāya bheda paraṃ maraṇa sugatiṃ
kho devānaminda evamidhekacca sattā kāya bheda paraṃ maraṇa
anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappa anekepi vivaṭṭakappa anekepi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappa amutrāsiṃ evaṃnāma
dukkhanti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti ayaṃ
anekepi vivaṭṭakappa anekepi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappa amutrāsiṃ evaṃnāma evaṃgotta evaṃvaṇṇa
dukkhapareta appeva nāma imassa kevala dukkhakkhandha antakiriyā paññāyethāti
kusalānaṃ dhamma ṭhitiyā asammosa bhiyyobhāva vepulla bhāvanā pāripūriyā
vivaṭṭakappa anekepi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappa amutrāsiṃ evaṃnāma evaṃgotta evaṃvaṇṇa evamāhāra
na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati na vimuccati etaṃ
dukkhasamudayoti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti ayaṃ dukkhanirodhoti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti ayaṃ

idaṃ dukkhanti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti
musā mayā bhaṇitanti vinidhāya diṭṭhiṃ vinidhāya khantiṃ vinidhāya
moggallāna evamidhekacca sattā kāya bheda paraṃ maraṇa sugatiṃ
mārisa moggallāna evamidhekacca sattā kāya bheda paraṃ maraṇa
maraṇa apāyaṃ duggati vinipāta niraya upapanna ime vā
āloka uppanna yathā taṃ appamatta ātāpī pahitatta viharanta
āmantesi āvuso bhikkhaveti āvusoti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato

udāyī akkhātā mayā sāvaka paṭipadā yathāpaṭipanna me sāvaka
tathūpamāhaṃ bhikkhave imaṃ puggala vadāmi kathañca bhikkhave puggala
na vimuccati etaṃ santanti passato tassa mayhaṃ ānanda
jetavana obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavant abhivādetvā
upāyāsa dukkhotiṇṇa dukkhapareta appeva nāma imassa kevala dukkhakkhandha
manoviññeyya dhamma iṭṭha kantā manāpa piyarūpa kāmūpasaṃhita rajanīya
saṃvaṭṭakappa anekepi vivaṭṭakappa anekepi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappa amutrāsiṃ evaṃnāma evaṃgotta
apāyaṃ duggati vinipāta niraya upapanna ime vā pana

kevalakappaṃ jetavana obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavant
phala aññatara phalaṃ pāṭikaṅkha diṭṭheva dhamma aññā sati

ayaṃ dukkhanirodhoti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāmī paṭipadāti yathābhūtaṃ
dvinnaṃ phala aññatara phalaṃ pāṭikaṅkha diṭṭheva dhamma aññā
pariyāpuṇāti sutta geyya veyyākaraṇa gāthaṃ udānaṃ itivuttaka jātaka
ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti ayaṃ dukkhanirodhoti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti
pañcannaṃ orambhāgiya saṃyojana parikkhaya opapātika tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhamma
khata upahata attānaṃ pariharati sāvajja ca hoti sānuvajja
bhāveti vīriyasamādhi pe cittasamādhi pe vīmaṃsāsamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgata iddhipāda bhāveti
ka saccaṃ bhagavāti vigarahi buddha bhagavā pe kathañhi
no bhante dhamma pe rūpa kho bhikkhave sati
na hoti tathāgata paraṃ maraṇa idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti
ekantanibbidāya virāga nirodha upasama abhiññāya sambodha nibbāna saṃvattati
vaṇṇavanto sukhabahulāti tassa evaṃ hoti aho vatāhaṃ kāya
dhamma ādikalyāṇa majjhekalyāṇa pariyosānakalyāṇa sāttha sabyañjana kevalaparipuṇṇa parisuddha
dhamma ṭhitiyā asammosa bhiyyobhāva vepulla bhāvanā pāripūriyā chandaṃ
nissajjitabba saṅgha vā gaṇa vā puggala vā evañca
ayampi dhamma sāraṇīya piyakaraṇa garukaraṇa saṅgaha avivāda sāmaggiyā
gaṇa vā puggala vā evañca pana bhikkhave nissajjitabba
pe katama ca bhikkhave asaṅkhatagāmimagga idha bhikkhave bhikkhu
bhikkhū āmantesi āvuso bhikkhaveti āvusoti kho te bhikkhū

paraṃ maraṇa apāyaṃ duggati vinipāta niraya upapanna ime
satta pajānāti ime vata bhonto sattā kāyaduccarita samannāgata
aññatara phalaṃ pāṭikaṅkha diṭṭheva dhamma aññā sati vā

jātisatasahassampi anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappe anekepi vivaṭṭakappe anekepi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe amutrāsiṃ
maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto
paro loko natthi sattā opapātikā natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ
jātiyo paññāsampi jātiyo jātisatampi jātisahassampi jātisatasahassampi anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappe
deva chandaṃ pajaha jīvite apekkhaṃ mākāsi imāni te

loko natthi sattā opapātikā natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ

sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto appeva
pāpako vipāko diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāyañcāti so iti
na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya
vata bhonto sattā kāyaduccaritena samannāgatā vacīduccaritena samannāgatā manoduccaritena
te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṃ āyasmā sāriputto etadavoca

ubhato sujāto mātito ca pitito ca saṃsuddhagahaṇiko yāva
upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā
mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā tatrāpi na
tasmiṃ samaye viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke
pārājikassa āpatti thullaccayassāti tena kho pana samayena aññataro
attānaṃ byākareyya khīṇanirayomhi khīṇatiracchānayoni khīṇapettivisayo khīṇāpāyaduggativinipāto sotāpannohamasmi avinipātadhammo
kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā
samaye viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ
paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ
hoti yaṃ balaṃ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti
nissajjitabbaṃ saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā evañca
cittaṃ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya yassa
tathāgatabalaṃ hoti yaṃ balaṃ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ
bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā
sātaccāya padhānāya yassa cittaṃ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya
addhunā na ittaraṃ manasikarotā no amanasikarotā paññavatā no
ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ
mukhato ca nāsato ca kaṇṇato ca assāsapassāsesu uparuddhesu
hi sādhu bhagavato abbhakkhānaṃ na hi bhagavā evaṃ
dīghena addhunā na ittaraṃ manasikarotā no amanasikarotā paññavatā
abbhācikkhi na hi sādhu bhagavato abbhakkhānaṃ na hi
pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā tatrāpi na saññī assa saññī
nissajjāmīti pe dadeyyāti pe dadeyyunti pe āyasmato dammīti
viññāṇaṃ netaṃ mama nesohamasmi na meso attāti evametaṃ

diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi yathā
kho pāpako vipāko diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāyañcāti so
bhante bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ

jhāna upasampajja viharati vitakkavicārā vūpasama ajjhattaṃ sampasādana cetaso
buddha bhagavāti dhamma pe saṅgha pe ariyakanta sīla
lokavidū anuttara purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussā buddha bhagavā so
sappurisa akkhataṃ anupahata attānaṃ pariharati anavajja ca hoti
esohamasmi eso me attāti no hetaṃ bhante taṃ
saññā sati saṅkhāra sati viññāṇa sati viññāṇa upādāya
bhāvita bahulīkata yānīkata vatthukata anuṭṭhita paricita susamāraddha atha
iti dibba cakkhu visuddha atikkantamānusaka satta passati cavamāna
